author: Yahoo Sports
title: Home destroyed by fire on Thursday southwest of Jamestown
text:
The Jamestown Sun, N.D. Home destroyed by fire on Thursday southwest of Jamestown The Jamestown Sun, N.D. 5:52 AM ¬∑ 1 min read
Dec. 28‚ÄîFire destroyed a home about 15 miles southwest of Jamestown on Thursday, Dec. 28, said Brian Paulson, fire chief of the Jamestown Rural Fire Department.
"It was a total loss ... by the time we got there," he said. "The roof was completely in on the building."
The fire was reported at 9:19 a.m. at 7545 43rd St. SE. Paulson said no one had been staying in the home because there was no power due to the ice storm earlier this week, and the homeowner went to check on the ranch-style residence on Thursday.
"The roof was on fire when the homeowner got home there," Paulson said.
Six trucks and 15 firefighters responded and were at the scene for three hours, he said. Also assisting the department were the Stutsman County Sheriff's Office, North Dakota Highway Patrol, Jamestown Area Ambulance, American Red Cross and the Stutsman County Road Department.
The cause of the fire is under investigation, Paulson said.
View comments

author: Soje Leslie
title: Blueface Sparks Debate After Shading Black Single Mothers
text:
Blueface is getting criticism for his statement about black women who are single mothers.
The Los Angeles rapper has mastered the art of staying relevant in online discussions. After getting into it with Soulja Boy and his baby mother, Chrisean Rock, before Christmas, Blueface again sparked outrage over a tweet about black women in which he included his mother, Karlissa Saffold.
‚ÄúAll black women would choose to be single moms on government assistance over any man that‚Äôs been scientifically proven before Blueface don‚Äôt blame me,‚Äù he tweeted.
Blueface also brags about buying a 4-story house for his baby mother, Jaidyn Alexis. ‚ÄúMy Bm got a 4 story house with an elevator for Christmas what did your BD get you,‚Äù he tweeted before adding, ‚ÄúBunch of single Bm‚Äôs with no Christmas gift sounds miserable should have just got a dog b**ch at least he would have watched him self.‚Äù
Women are now sounding off about the ‚ÄúThotiana‚Äù rapper‚Äôs tweet, with a lot of them saying they would rather be a single mother on government assistance than to be his baby mother. ‚ÄúOhh see this is why he was in his feelings. Any rational woman Black, white, or brown would rather be a single mother than deal with him and that thought hurt him to his core,‚Äù one woman wrote.
Blueface also has some legal troubles on his hands following some crude comment about Soulja Boy‚Äôs baby mother.
Soulja Boy‚Äôs baby momma is suing Blueface after he alleged that he had sex with her just before her baby shower.
Blueface started beefing with Soulja Boy last week in which he claimed that his private part was bigger than the ‚ÄúCrank That‚Äù rapper and that he had slept with his baby momma as a way to one-up the rapper in an argument.
It seems that the baby momma, Jackilyn Martinez, is not taking to the internet to clear things as has become common with celebrities. Still, she‚Äôs taking the rapper to court for defamation of character.
According to TMZ, some of the tweets Blueface made were included in her claim, which she says are all false and defamatory to her and her child.
Among the tweets by Blueface is one where he told Soulja Boy, ‚ÄúBecause I f**ked your baby mama the day before your baby shower.‚Äù
Other things he‚Äôs said include one where he‚Äôs claiming paternity of the child- ‚ÄúTill Soulja get a DNA test that‚Äôs my child lil bro I‚Äôm the daddy now,‚Äù and ‚ÄúWhat‚Äôs old about your baby mama s**king my d**k.‚Äù
One tweet said, ‚ÄúThis his Bm right here‚Ä¶ shouldn‚Äôt have brought up Jaidyn f**k n****a‚Ä¶ play this at the Versus and it‚Äôs over,‚Äù while another added, ‚ÄúI hit yah Bm already soulja boy ash her who perform better hit for hit.‚Äù
‚ÄúSoulja kissing d*** everytime he see his child [laughing emoji] might be my kid je ain‚Äôt even get the DNA test,‚Äù another said.
Martinez does admit that she and Blueface had protected sex in 2018, but they have never gotten together since. She also filed the lawsuit after her lawyers intervened and sent him a cease and desist letter to remove the defamatory comments. However, a defiant Blueface taunted her on Instagram, writing, ‚ÄúNobody ever said your name ‚Ä¶ I don‚Äôt even know who you are.‚Äù
She also says in her lawsuit that she‚Äôs been receiving death threats following the letter was received. Blueface has not reacted to the lawsuit so far.

title: Vasco fecha acordo com Cruzeiro para avan√ßar pela contrata√ß√£o de Lucas Oliveira | futebol | ge
text:
Vasco acerta venda do zagueiro L√©o ao Athletico-PR
O Vasco chegou a um acordo verbal com o Cruzeiro e recebeu o aval para avan√ßar pela contrata√ß√£o do zagueiro Lucas Oliveira, que estava emprestado ao Kyoto Sanga, do Jap√£o. As conversas ocorriam h√° pelo menos um m√™s.
+ Contrata√ß√µes do Vasco para 2025: veja quem chega e quem vai embora
+ Vai e vem do mercado: acompanhe as √∫ltimas movimenta√ß√µes dos clubes
A diretoria vasca√≠na, agora, vai sentar com os representantes do jogador para discutir sal√°rio e os pormenores do contrato que, a princ√≠pio, ser√° at√© dezembro de 2026. As partes est√£o confiantes no acerto.
Conclu√≠da essa √∫ltima etapa, Vasco e Cruzeiro v√£o assinar os contratos e selar a transfer√™ncia em definitivo do jogador.
1 de 1 Lucas Oliveira em a√ß√£o pelo Kyoto Sanga ‚Äî Foto: Hiroki Watanabe/Getty Images Lucas Oliveira em a√ß√£o pelo Kyoto Sanga ‚Äî Foto: Hiroki Watanabe/Getty Images
O acordo entre Vasco e Lucas Oliveira n√£o dever√° ser um problema porque o jogador v√™ a negocia√ß√£o com bons olhos. Ele quer voltar ao Brasil depois de uma temporada inteira fora, j√° que em 2024 defendeu o Valladolid e o Kyoto Sanga por empr√©stimo. Seu filho pequeno acabou de nascer.
Nascido no Rio de Janeiro, Lucas tem contrato com o Cruzeiro at√© dezembro do ano que vem. A Raposa det√©m 70% dos seus direitos econ√¥micos - os 30% restantes pertencem ao Atl√©tico-GO.
Lucas Oliveira chegou ao Cruzeiro em 2022, depois de quatro anos defendendo o Atl√©tico-GO. Pela equipe mineira, o zagueiro fez 79 jogos, com quatro gols e duas assist√™ncias em duas temporadas. No in√≠cio deste ano, foi emprestado ao Valladolid, onde conseguiu o acesso em La Liga com o time de Ronaldo Fen√¥meno.
No Kyoto, atuou em sete jogos, dois deles como titular.

author: Gothic
title: #24 Ant√≥n Losada triunfa con su resumen en 49 segundos del plan de la Xunta de Galicia para hacer frente a las "bolitas pl√°sticas"
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
"Las bolitas" ya est√°n llegando a Asturias y Cantabria.
https://www.diariodenavarra.es/noticias/vivir/medio-ambiente/2024/01/07/xunta-pide-calma-el-vertido-plasticos-llegado-costa-gallega-594826-3281.html
A Ant√≥n le faltaba esta imagen:
Ni bolsa ni cubo ni nada para almacenarlos , seguramente los de TRAGSA lo teletrasportan a la Xunta desde los guantes:
https://www.nosdiario.gal/articulo/social/dez-minutos-material-informacion-asi-actua-xunta-limpeza-pellets/20240106180705186592.html
Informativo de la televisi√≥n de Galicia hoy:
http://www.crtvg.es/tvg/a-carta/telexornal-mediodia-fds-6368588?t=686
Me parece la polla lo de la Xunta.
Una comunidad que vive mucho de su mar y de sus playas y su turismo, y llevan 15 d√≠as sin menear un puto dedo porque la culpa y responsabilidad es de Perroxanxe.
Gobiernan para los gallegos, as√≠ que que hagan todo lo que est√© en su mano y si el gobierno no mueve un dedo, entonces crit√≠cas y pides ayuda, pero no, me toco los webos a manos llenas y la culpa es de PerroXanxe que quiere ver Galicia arder porque la gobierna el PP.
Que el gobierno tenga su plan de acci√≥n o responsabilidad no es √≥bice para que la Xunta haga todo lo que sea necesario.
Del propio art√≠culo:
"De forma paralela se est√°n realizando gestiones para conseguir m√°quinas cribadoras que se puedan pasar por la arena para sacar los pl√°sticos, aunque precisan permisos de la Xunta y avanzan que "est√° complicado"."
¬øLos voluntarios est√°n buscando por su cuenta maquinas cribadoras pero el permiso para utilizarlas no se lo van a dar?
Es que es para mear y no echar gota. Y el Gobierno de Ejpa√±a tambien deber√≠a hac√©rselo mirar
[#13](c13#c-13) pero si ya gobiernan en la regi√≥n .... ¬øQu√© les va a dar m√°s votos?¬øhacer algo para que los gallegos los vean preocupados y as√≠ mantener sus poltronas o no hacer nada? Es que es la hostia, es como la ant√≠tesis de todo. Del PP nunca espero grandes alardes, pero est√°n alcanzando cotas de imbecilidad pol√≠tica nunca vistas.
Ni que fuera el presidente a agachar la lomera a recoger trozos de pl√°stico. Ya lo va a hacer alg√∫n currito mal pagado. No estamos hablando de tecnolog√≠a aeroespacial, que es doblar el lomo y limpiar.
Es para flipar.
Edito: nada en contra de las personas que trabajan en la limpieza. No se me entienda mal.
[#17](c17#c-17) desgraciadamente s√≠. En la mesa, nada de hablar de pol√≠tica, no vaya a ser que el rojeras del hijo se inflame.
Y hay muchos en esa mesa. Y en las de la familia no tan cercana, muchos m√°s
Y edito m√°s : Creo que algun primo (como m√≠nimo) se lo ha visto por Ferraz. S√≠. Cr√©eme. S√≠ que los conozco.
[#7](c7#c-7) [#12](c12#c-12) Mirad, simplemente... No dudo que la gente sea bienintencionada, pero estas ideas son poco realistas. En el 2013 se hizo un muestreo de micropl√°sticos en la franja intermareal de la costa de Portugal y los valores medios estaban en varios cientos de mg/m^2. Para la zona intermareal de cualquier playa peque√±a de Galicia eso supone varias toneladas de residuos (y estamos hablando de una franja diminuta que no incluye fondos, ni agua, ni nada de nada).
Los vertidos se combaten con inspecciones, multas, leyes, regulaciones medioambientales y modos de vida m√°s sostenibles; y con un tejido investigador y cient√≠fico por el que nadie en Espa√±a da nada, porque la capacidad para detectar, trazar, modelar y anticiparse a sentinazos existe (qu√© cojones, si hasta yo he tocado ese palo alguna vez), pero la gente que lo hace se ha (nos hemos) largado.
Tal vez se deber√≠a comenzar por ah√≠, pero es m√°s gratificante ir a recoger pellets a la playa.
[#23](c23#c-23) no te lo niego. Gastas bastante raz√≥n. Simplemente, no doy cr√©dito porque actuar as√≠ no es de tontos, es de mezquinos. Eso es lo que me enerva m√°s, y es la en√©sima vez.
Losada parece tener una relaci√≥n cercana con el BNG, lo cual podr√≠a influir en su perspectiva pol√≠tica. Su abordaje ir√≥nico del plan de la Xunta podr√≠a estar te√±ido por sus conexiones pol√≠ticas. Me veo onligado a cuestionar la objetividad de la informaci√≥n y considerar las posibles influencias detr√°s de estas noticias.
[#20](c20#c-20) La xunta tiene un plan que no aplic√≥ y ahora est√° tratando de resolver esto desde la propaganda y culpando al gobierno del estado cuando la competencia en caso de vertido es de la conseller√≠a del Mar.
[#7](c7#c-7) El plan existe y funciona; Justo antes de las elecciones se reparten unas ayudas de dinero publico y vuelven a ganar.
